changes_reviewed.notes: Consistent logging across the codebase improves maintainability and debugging capabilities.

changes_reviewed.change: Replaced 5 silent error handling (try?) with proper do-catch blocks
changes_reviewed.notes: Proper error handling ensures errors are not silently ignored and can be tracked and debugged.
Using the current API prevents deprecation warnings and ensures future compatibility.

changes_reviewed.change: Added defer block for proper file handle cleanup
changes_reviewed.notes: Proper resource cleanup prevents file handle leaks and improves reliability.

changes_reviewed.change: All errors now logged with GitBrainLogger.warning()
changes_reviewed.notes: Consistent error logging provides better visibility into issues.

feedback.collaboration_notes: This demonstrates excellent collaboration between AIs. OverseerAI provided suggestions, CoderAI implemented them, and the result is improved code quality with better error handling and consistent logging. This is the 3rd successful implementation of OverseerAI review suggestions (GitManager, CLI, and now LoggingPlugin).
